title: Banana Poppy Seed Muffins
ingredients: ['150g (5 oz) wholemeal flour', '85g (3 oz) wheat bran', '50g (2 oz) wheatgerm', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '2 eggs', '4 tablespoons honey', '4 tablespoons vegetable oil', '225g (8 oz) mashed bananas', '110ml (4 fl oz) semi-skimmed milk', '1 dessertspoon fresh lemon juice', '4 to 6 tablespoons poppy seeds']
